display_long_description:
# Step into the ultimate divine test of balance, endurance, and sheer absurdity!
In Can You Hold It?, the God of Gods has summoned you for one simple task - hold on for dear life! Sounds easy? Think again. Objects appear in your hands - some light, some heavy, some slimy and alive. As you struggle to keep your grip, the world around you shifts in unexpected ways. Your only goal? Don’t. Drop. Anything.



[media]
# DODGE THE WACKY DANGERS!
Holding the object is only the beginning! The game will throw everything at you to make you wobble. Brace yourself against powerful gusts of wind, keep an eye out for sneaky cats, swarming hornets, and even a surprise visit from a creepy tarantula - each one ready to test your nerves. The experience is so intense, you’ll probably jump higher than the cat!
[media]
-  Physics-Based VR Madness - Every object has realistic weight, movement, and unexpected behaviors.
- Unpredictable Chaos - The God of Gods loves mischief—brace yourself for insane environmental hazards.
-  Endless Replayability - No two runs are the same! Beat your high score and challenge your friends.
-  Fast-Paced & Addictive - Perfect for quick, hilarious VR/MR sessions and party challenges.

# THE PERFECT PARTY GAME

[media]
Are you ready to laugh? Jump into the fun and prove you have the steadiest hands in the house!
